mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data_model (model_name, data_source_db_name, data_source_table_name, note, transverse, longitudinal, data_model_create_time) VALUES (#{modelName}, #{dbName}, #{tabName}, #{modelDesc}, #{transverse}, #{longitudinal}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT id AS `key`, model_name AS modelName, data_source_db_name AS dbName, data_source_table_name AS tabName, note AS modelDesc FROM data_model

SELECT id AS `key`, model_name AS modelName, data_source_db_name AS dbName, data_source_table_name AS tabName, note AS modelDesc, transverse AS transverse, longitudinal AS longitudinal FROM data_model WHERE id = #{key}
mapper.update: UPDATE data_model SET model_name = #{modelName}, data_source_db_name = #{dbName}, data_source_table_name = #{tabName}, note = #{modelDesc}, transverse = #{transverse}, longitudinal = #{longitudinal}, data_model_create_time = now() WHERE id = #{key}
